question: YSR Rythu Bharosa scheme, which was seen in news recently, is associated with which state?
explanation:
The state Government of Andhra Pradesh has recently distributed Rs 1115 crore to 50 lakh farmers under the YSR Rythu Bharosa scheme. The scheme was introduced in the state in 2019.
Under the scheme, land owning farmer families who own cultivable land irrespective of its size will be provided a benefit of Rs.13,500 per year per family, including Rs.6,000 under PM-KISAN in three instalments.
